pr_title: [Transform] disallow field and script being empty for group sources

timeline.message: disallow field and script being empty for group sources

timeline.bodyText:
The parser is for receiving data from the server. Consequently, it should follow the same leniency that the lenient server parser has.
So, I don't think this declaration should be here (same for the rest of the HLRC group sources).
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: 👍 yes, you are right. I also need to move the other check into the builders, as the constructor is used from the parser.

replies.bodyText: however, I can't find any other place that validates. I will simply revert all HLRC changes.
